name: mri_vol2surf
author: FreeSurfer Developers
description: This program resamples a volume onto a surface of a subject or the sphere. The output can be viewed on the surface (using tksurfer) or can be used for surface-based intersubject averaging.

inputs.description: Registration file as computed by tkregister, spmregister, bbregister, etc.
inputs.name: Registration File

inputs.description: Output path for the resampled volume
inputs.name: Output Path

inputs.description: Reference volume name, default is orig.mgz
inputs.name: Reference Volume

inputs.description: Compute registration from header information, aligning the current volume with the subject/mri/orig.mgz
inputs.name: Regheader Subject

inputs.description: Target subject for resampling, can be a subject name or 'ico' for icosahedron
inputs.name: Target Subject

inputs.description: Hemisphere to process: lh = left hemisphere or rh = right hemisphere
inputs.name: Hemisphere

inputs.description: Target surface on which to resample, default is 'white'
inputs.name: Target Surface

output-files.description: Output file containing the resampled volume onto the surface
output-files.name: Resampled Volume Output
